name: Four Homers In One Game Trivia Quiz | MLB Records | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Green tied the record for homers in a game, he also set a major league record for total bases in a game. How many bases did he have?
questions.explanation:
19.

	Green's 19 total bases broke the major league record of 18 set by Joe Adcock of the Milwaukee Braves on July 31st, 1954.

questions.text: Which Atlanta Braves third baseman hit four homers on July 6th, 1986?
questions.explanation:
Bob Horner.

	Horner went 4 for 6 with 6 RBIs, but the Braves lost the game anyway.

questions.text: Who was the first player to hit four homers in a game?
questions.explanation:
Bobby Lowe.

	Bobby Lowe, for the Boston Beaneaters (Braves), hit the four homers against Cincinnati on May 30th, 1894.

questions.text: Green was the second Dodger to hit four HRs in a game. Who was the first Dodger (Brooklyn or Los Angeles) to hit four homers in a game?
questions.explanation:
Gil Hodges.

	Hodges accomplished the feat on August 31st, 1950 vs. Boston.

questions.text: Green was the second player to hit four homers in one game during the 2002 season. Who was the first?
questions.explanation:
Mike Cameron.

	Cameron, playing for Seattle, hit the four homers against Chicago on May 2nd, 2002.

questions.text: Who was the only player to hit four homers in a game during the 1990s?
questions.explanation:
Mark Whiten.

	Whiten, playing for St. Louis, hit the four homers at Cincinnati on September 7th, 1993.

questions.text: On July 18th, 1948, Pat Seerey of the Chicago White Sox, hit his 4th homer in extra innings. What inning was it?
Which Yankee great hit four homers in a game?
questions.explanation:
Lou Gehrig.

	Gehrig hit the four homers at Philadelphia on June 3rd, 1932. However, Gehrig's feat was overshadowed when John McGraw retired on the same day.

questions.text: What year did Phillies great Mike Schmidt hit his four homers?
questions.explanation:
1976.

	On April 17th, 1976, the Phillies overcame an 11-run deficit against the Cubs to win 18-16.

questions.text: Did Willie Mays ever hit four homers in a game?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Mays hit the four homers at Milwaukee on June 10th, 1961.
